translated: The aggregates are stopped by the power of the path.

original: rnam par phye ste smra ba'i sde pa rnams ni gang zag ni don dam par yod do //🔽'bras bu ma smin pa'i don ma gtogs pa 'das pa med do //🔽'bras bu las gzhan pa'i ma 'ongs pa med do //
analyzed: rnam par phye ste smra ba'i sde pa rnams ni gang zag ni don dam par yod do // 'bras bu ma smin pa'i don ma gtogs pa 'das pa med do // 'bras bu las gzhan pa'i ma 'ongs pa med do //
translated: The Vātsīputrīyas say that the person exists ultimately.🔽Past does not exist except for the meaning of the nonmaturation of results.

original: rigs mi mthun pa'i da ltar byung ba yang med do //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa'i da ltar byung ba yang med do //
translated: Future does not exist except for the meaning of the maturation of results.🔽Present does not exist except for the meaning of the maturation of results.

original: chos ni de ma thag pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos ni de ma thag pa'i rgyur mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Dharmas do not become the immediately preceding condition.

original: gzugs kyi 'dra ba'i rgyu yang med do zhes de ltar blta'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'dra ba'i rgyu yang med do zhes de ltar blta'o //
translated: The cause of the likeness of form does not exist.

original: 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i sde pa rgyal byed tshal gnas pa'i sde dang / 'jigs med ring gnas pa'i sde dang / gtsug lag khang chen gnas pa'i sde 'di gsum ni lta ba mthun te /
analyzed: 'phags pa gnas brtan pa'i sde pa rgyal byed tshal gnas pa'i sde dang / 'jigs med ring gnas pa'i sde dang / gtsug lag khang chen gnas pa'i sde 'di gsum ni lta ba mthun te /
translated: The noble Sthavira, Jetavanīya, Abhayagirivāsin, and Mahāvihāravāsin schools are similar in their views.

original: lha rnams la ni lam bsgom pa med do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: lha rnams la ni lam bsgom pa med do zhes zer ro //
translated: They say that gods do not cultivate the path.

original: 'phags pa thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa rnam pa bdun las gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba las byung ngo //
analyzed: 'phags pa thams cad yod par smra ba'i sde pa rnam pa bdun las gzhi thams cad yod par smra ba las byung ngo //
translated: The noble school of the Sarvastivadins is divided into seven subschools, the Mulasarvastivadins being the first.

original: thub pa ni legs par sbyar ba mi gsung ngo //
analyzed: thub pa ni legs par sbyar ba mi gsung ngo //
translated: The Sage did not speak the Sanskrit language.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa bcu phan chad nas sum cu tshun chad kyis 'grub bo //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa grangs med pa bcu phan chad nas sum cu tshun chad kyis 'grub bo //
translated: The Bodhisattva is realized after ten incalculable periods of the three asaṃkhyeyas.

original: thar pa ma gtogs @156b pa 'dus ma byas pa med do //
analyzed: thar pa ma gtogs @156b pa 'dus ma byas pa med do //
translated: There is no unconditioned thing except for cessation.

original: log par shes pa dang mi shes pa med do //
analyzed: log par shes pa dang mi shes pa med do //
translated: There is no wrong cognition or non-cognition.

original: phra rgyas ni sems las tha dad do //
analyzed: phra rgyas ni sems las tha dad do //
translated: The anuśayas are different from the mind.

original: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la ni sems yod do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la ni sems yod do zhes zer ro //
translated: There is mind in the attainment of cessation.

original: 'phags pa kun gyis bkur ba'i sde pas sgrogs rigs kyi sde dang / srung ba pa'i sde dang / gnas ma'i bu'i sde 'di gsum yang lta ba mthun te /🔽gang zag ni phung po rnams kyang ma yin la /
analyzed: 'phags pa kun gyis bkur ba'i sde pas sgrogs rigs kyi sde dang / srung ba pa'i sde dang / gnas ma'i bu'i sde 'di gsum yang lta ba mthun te / gang zag ni phung po rnams kyang ma yin la /
translated: The noble school of the Ekavyavaharikas, the school of the Gokuliyas, and the school of the Bahusrutiyas are in agreement on the following points:

original: phung po rnams las thar pa tha dad pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: phung po rnams las thar pa tha dad pa yang ma yin no //
translated: The pudgala is neither the aggregates nor different from the aggregates.

original: phung po rnams ni dus gzhan du yang brtan par 'dug go //🔽rnam par shes pa lnga'i sgo nas ni 'dod chags skye bar yang mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: phung po rnams ni dus gzhan du yang brtan par 'dug go // rnam par shes pa lnga'i sgo nas ni 'dod chags skye bar yang mi 'gyur la /
translated: The aggregates are stable at other times as well.🔽Attachment does not arise nor does it cease through the five sense consciousnesses.

original: 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Attachment does not arise nor does it cease through mental consciousness.

original: mthong ba'i lam ni sems kyi skad cig bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam ni sems kyi skad cig bcu gnyis so //
translated: The path of seeing has twelve moments of mind.

original: de phan chad ni 'bras bu dang ldan par gnas so //
analyzed: de phan chad ni 'bras bu dang ldan par gnas so //
translated: After that, one abides in the result.

original: shes par bya ba ni brjod du yod pa dang / brjod du med pa'o zhes zer te /
analyzed: shes par bya ba ni brjod du yod pa dang / brjod du med pa'o zhes zer te /
translated: The knowable is said to be expressible and inexpressible.

original: yul dang slob dpon gyi bye brag gis 'dir bye brag drug tu brjod do //🔽gzhung tha dad pa rim par bklag pa'i 'khor lo btsun pa dbyig bshes kyis mdzad pa las /
analyzed: yul dang slob dpon gyi bye brag gis 'dir bye brag drug tu brjod do // gzhung tha dad pa rim par bklag pa'i 'khor lo btsun pa dbyig bshes kyis mdzad pa las /
translated: Here, six are mentioned due to the distinctions of country and teacher.🔽The wheel of reading in sequence of different texts composed by the Venerable Vasu mitra.

original: sde pa tha dad pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'dul ba 'dzin pa slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: sde pa tha dad pa bsdus pa zhes bya ba 'dul ba 'dzin pa slob dpon dul ba'i lhas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The summary of different schools called Vinaya-dhara composed by the master Vinita deva is complete.
